name: FPS Sniper Commando IGI Action
description:
Tag and shoot! Sniper Commando IGI Action: FPS Shoot Game is real frontline and addictive military action shooting game to fight against terrorists and gangsters. The First Person Shooter game will blow you away with amazing shooter game-play and be engaging special ops missions, challenging the best players in the war against terrorism. Play this game you will feel like in a real assassin combat. Kill the enemies in the midst of survivor combat.Those who love bravo fury shooting games will also love Sniper Commando IGI Action: FPS shoot game. Grab your gun and show your fps army commando assassin shoots skills and don't let the gangsters escape. Let's go for IGI commando sniper mission in the real Sahara desert old city with the 3D realistic environment and awesome graphics.

If you like best shooting games so play Sniper Commando IGI Action: FPS Shoot Game, and don't forget to rate and review.This game is amazing sniper simulation and very popular and very smooth frontier commando shooting gameplay. This modern game is a thrilling action-adventure FPS game that developed for the fans of shooting games. This game gives you the exciting experience to complete the mission. Download now one of the best fps shooter game. Turn your android phone into shooting games online battlefield, filled with dangers and threats at every step. Gear your sniper shooter rifle and complete tough hitman missions to shoot down terrorist enemies in the desert battlefield. You are the uninvited hostile in the area, and the enemy will bear no expense to slaughter you down.

GAME TOP FEATURES
- 10 Engaging hitman sniper shooter missions in deadly territories
- Engaging modern combat against terrorism in the desert region
- Incredibly optimized and smooth first-person shooter game controls for mobile devices
- Extreme Black Ops missions in the later stages to test your ultimate sniper shooter skills
- A realistic 3d Sahara desert city environment with amazing views
- Easy and Simple to play Military FPS commando adventure game

HOW TO PLAY
- Touch screen to play shooting mode and kill enemies
- Open your rifle lens, zoom in or out of the distance aim and shoot the enemies
- Tap fire button to shoot
